name: OPUS: Rocket of Whispers
description: Rocket of Whispers is an award-winning post-apocalyptic adventure that follows two survivors on a journey to launch a space burial for the lost souls of their desolate world. Help them search the snowy wasteland for supplies and the courage to say goodbye.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 10 Processor: 1.4 GHz Dual Core or Greater Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 256 MB OpenGL 2.0 compatible graphics card
